about_the_game:
This DLC offers a detailed look into the world of The Roc, covering character designs, plot development, and insights from the creation process. It includes analyses of the characters and story elements, along with additional background information that didn't make it into the main storyline.

The collection features concept art and design choices that shaped each character and narrative piece. Early sketches, unused concepts, and creative inspirations are included, accompanied by commentary and anecdotes from the development team.

The DLC also contains anecdotes and trivia from the production period, providing a behind-the-scenes perspective on the development of The Roc.

Instructions:

After downloading, right-click on the application icon or cover of "The Roc" in your Steam library, then select [Manage] > [Browse Local Files] from the menu to access the digital art book file "The Art of The Roc.pdf."
